cancellationPolicy.title: Cancellation Process
points: You may cancel a service at any time, but a refund will only be issued if the cancellation is requested within the specified refund timeframe for the relevant service.
Please be aware that some services have different refund policies or requirements, and there are services that are not eligible for a refund under any circumstance.

projectCancellation.title: Project Cancellation
projectCancellation.content: If you decide to cancel a project, a 30% deduction will be applied, and the remaining amount will be refunded.
